Heard of? I love sci-fi (most of the time, mind you), I guess I could refer to it as true.

THe user below me loves mariokart Double Dash (who doesn't?)

Haven't played it. I will say that MarioKart 4-way split screen is the greatest multiplayer video game ever (though it often devolves into fisticuffs).

The user below me has visited at least two continents.

Yup. Europe and north america. (how did you know??)

The user below me loves MLP.

Ding ding ding, we have a winner! (A.K.A. True)

The user below me prefers SpaceX over Orbital Science.

Hmmmm, hard one.

I hate the controls for the Mariokart Wii! Hate it!

aww thanks.

A whole 3! how my head didn't explode yet???

edit: (1 language used at home, 2nd used at work, 3rd used on internet xD)
